players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I'm shocked that Diana was killed. We need to discuss and figure out who might be behind this."
Bob: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. We must vote him out today!"
Charlie: "Bob, you're clearly lying to deflect suspicion. I think you're the mafioso—vote for him!"
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso, as I investigated him last night. His accusation against me is just a desperate bluff. We must vote him out now!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
